content.detailedDescription:
Please erase my first report and use this one instead. thank you!






on the 11th, my husband called me from sandy springs ga. and said he had been watching a bright starlike object in the sky. he said it was just hovering. i thought he was crazy! well, the next night, the 12th, he called me outside our home in atlanta ga. and he showed me a bright light in the sky. he claims its the same object as the night before. i could not believe it. it was much larger than a star and much brighter. i went inside and got my camera and started taking pictures of it. as i was watching the object, it was as if someone turned the light off. it  disappeared! i stood outside and watched and waited and about 15 minutes later the light was back. i started taking more pictures, as i noticed it was moving downward. i continued until it went out if sight.
content.summary: A very bright light hovering in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
i live on the west side of indianapolis.
     my neighbor called my attention to the sky south of our building, and there is something in the sky....Not another thing to be seen excepting an occasional airplane (we're near the airport)....And this thing seems very bright.  and it doesn't move.  she said she watched it all the way home from bargersville, and said it hasn't move yet.  
     it's in the western sky, just visible above the roof of the building next door (we live in an apartment complex...The buildings are close to each other).
     i couldn't see anything but a bright light, but with field glasses, the following was visible:
     the best way i can describe it is that it's a ring of light with little circular-appearing bud-like objects on the outer perimeter, with more of them seeming to be on the upper and right side of the ring, and none on the southern half of the circle.
     at first the little "buds" were at the top....Let's say at 11 and 1 o'clock.  they now (half an hour later) appear to have "stems" with "buds" at the ends....Might this indicate a changing of positions?
     it's 8:58 p.M. and it's gone now.
content.summary: A ring with what look like buds on the outer perimeter, indianapolis.

content.detailedDescription:
So i left and went to my house in cleveland, ohio, and got my roommate, at that time, and we left together to go and speak to channel 3 news.
the date was october 1, 1973.
the news channel people and me and my roommate were walking towards the landing site, in the field, when suddenly someone stopped us. they stopped filming the story and everyone had to leave. we were told to not come back to the area, that it was now a restricted area.
a couple of days later, a general from phoenix, arizona arrived at my door. i asked him what he wanted. he had a uniform on with stars on the shoulders. he asked me if i was the woman who had seen the ufo. i told him that i was. he asked me to answer some questions about the sighting. i told him i was pretty exhausted from answering questions from the news channels here in cleveland, and that i didn't want to. he told me i had to answer the questions. i told him that i was a united states citizen, and that i had rights, and that i didn't have to answer his questions.
the general told me that i was right. i was a united states citizen, and he said that we are your government, and we own you. he told me i would either answer his questions here or in phoenix, arizona, at the air force base there. i asked him what i would do with my 4 year old daughter, pointing to her in the background. he said they had a place to put her until we got back to cleveland.
i told him i would answer his questions the next day. he arrived and i answered his questions, but he answered none of mine.
now the odd part of all of this, to me, was that i had only a few years earlier, realized that i began my drive home to cleveland, ohio, from olmsted falls, ohio. it was about a 20-25 minute drive back home. but when i arrived at my mother's house, it was already morning time, with mom having her coffee already. this would have made it 9 or 10 in the morning! what happened to these hours between 3:30 am - 9 or 10 am?
i am submitting newspaper clippings from the plain dealer, and the press, newspapers articles. the cleveland press went out of business since then.
i would a field investigator to talk with me about this sighting.
content.summary: I watched the ufo pass over my car and land in the field, after dropping my sister off at her house.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting in the jacuzzi facing west, then i noticed a glowing object low on the horizon, and then i watched it gain altitude and came towards us, faster than an airplane.  after five or six seconds it was right overhead.  it appeared to have a warm, golden, orange glow.  couldn't see any features, looked like plasma.  my husband saw the object also and we watched it go east and then disappear from view. we noticed that one of christine dickey's photos matched the object perfectly.  her photo will be attached to this report.
content.summary: Looked up and saw a glowing object over the house.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Very bright it was too close to be a star......... i would have taken a picture but i just moved into my apartment and could not locate my camera. object was about 5-10 miles away very bright a cloud past beneath it and you could still see it brightly.  my wife came outside and witnessed it then became afraid and went back inside.  

 i was making food on the outdoor patio

i looked up and noticed it right away, there were stars in the sky to the east where the moon was and none very visible in the sky where the object hung.

again this was not flare ot was a very bright none blinking or flickering object. 

i was most positive of what it was because low clouds past through it and it remained bright as can be .

object moved horizantaliy (sp) back and forth then took off.

again where i live the sky is very clear so i know waht i saw.

contact me if you like.


last but not least i was in the navy and use to study and search the sky at night and this is the first sighting i ever had and i swear by it.
content.summary: Very bright object in the south west sky.

content.detailedDescription: I saw the object the second time at aprox. 1:15pm on feb 12 2009 from my office window on the top/third floor.Something told me to look out,so i did and i saw this object heading west into a cloud, then out, then did a zig-zag motion and went into reverse, then forward towards west again, going into a cloud and never coming out of it.
content.summary: It was silver/grey oval shaped object that was moving east, then stopped, then dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Approx. 11:00 am on a sunday morning,driving north on m-35 north of the cedar river bridge, my husband who was driving asked what the black dot was above the trees in the road ahead of us and did i see it to? (he had recent eye surgery and was worried about "black dots in his vision)i could also see it. we thought it was a small plane.It was quickly approaching us above the trees and as it got closer, it got bigger and bigger. it was pure black. it had no lights. it didn't make any sound.It looked - as it got closer, as if it were standing on edge, straight up and down and shaped like a diamond with small projections ( like points but not sharp) coming out from it - like a shield with points? it was huge, like a floating garage, as it passed over us. we stopped the car to watch it - but in that instant, it was gone. it has always bothered us. what in hell did we see that morning? has anyone else seen this?
content.summary: Large, black object, like a floating garage.

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were hauling fire wood across millinocket lake to our remote cabin on the back side of the lake. we hauled a total of six trips in a side by side atv with tracks on it.  we started hauling wood at around 1 pm and each trip averaged 90 minutes round trip from our truck full of wood in the black cat parking lot, cross the lake (5-6 miles), unload the atv and return back to the truck for more wood.  it got dark around 6 pm and the sky was clear and the moon was large and bright.  millinocket lake sits in the shadow of mount katahdin (the tallest point in maine) and i recall that the moon lit the mountain brighter than any night i had seen in the past.  we started from the parking lot with our final load of wood about 9 pm.  it was a cold clear night and my brother and i had been trading off who was driving and it was his turn to drive while i rode in the passenger seat.  the atv we were in was traveling at a speed of about 15 miles per hour and about 2 miles across the lake i noticed  a yellow light  next to us about 50 feet about the tree line.  i first thought this was an odd star.  than i realized that it was in front of a mountain.  the light then shot a spot light down on the shoreline of the lake for roughly 2 seconds.  i alerted my brother and he then turned his head and watched the light as it followed right beside us the rest of the was across the lake.  when we got directly in front of our camp, yet still about 200 yards out on the frozen lake, we stopped the atv and started taking pictures of the light.  the first 2 pictures were taken with a flash and the rest (5 or 6) were taken in twilight mode. when we stopped, the light stopped and was around 1/2 mile from us and 50 feet above the tree line.  the light slowly turned from yellow to orange.  then it slowly changed from one light to what appeared to be three lines of red light forming a triangle with a distinct black spot in the middle.  we turned the atv toward the light so that our head lights were pointing directly at it.  we then shut the atv off and watched it hoping that it would move or do something.  we sat there for 10 minutes or so just watching it in complete darkness, and in retrospect, we should have taken more pictures, but it was soo cold (5-10 below zero) that it was unbearable to be out there without gloves on to operate the camera.  my brother and i decided to continue in the camp and unload our firewood so we could retreat at a faster speed if needed.  we pulled off the lake and the triangle was blocked from our view for no more than 7 or 8 minutes while we unloaded the wood.  when we returned to the frozen lake, the light/triangle was gone and replaced by a smaller bright red light.  the red light followed us as the other light had, across the lake and we stopped in the middle of the lake when we noticed there were 2 red/white blinking lights coming from opposite directions toward our camp which was about 1 mile behind us.  both blinking lights disappeared behind trout mountain, and reappeared as they came over the the top of the mountain stopping directly over our camp.  then the blinking lights went in different directions, one coming around us on the drivers side about a mile away and maybe 200 feet up.  the other light went directly to the red light which hadn't  moved since we stopped.  the red light was about 3/4 - 1 mile on the passenger side about 50 feet above the tree line.  then the blinking light got near the red light, the blinking light circled the red light for about 20 seconds and then slowly made its way behind us.  i said to my brother that i felt that they were surrounding us and i wanted to go.  he started forward as fast as the atv would go when all the dash lights on the atv came on and the atv's engine shut off.  for the record, this is a brand new 2009 atv with 200 miles on it. he tried to start it and the key did nothing.  we got out and lifted the hood to see if we could see any issues.  everything looked fine with the atv.  at this point all 3 lights were a little closer than before.  we climbed back in the atv and the engine started right up.  the red/white light directly behind us sped up and started coming around us on the passenger side toward the solid red light.  when the red/white blinking light got to the solid red light, the solid red light disappeared.  the 2 blinking red/white lights were now on either side of us and the one on the passenger side started coming directly at us.  it moved at about 10-15 miles an hour at an altitude of about 200 feet directly over us and i noticed it left a very small trail behind us though it wasn't like one from a jet.  it was more like steam from the difference in temp and whatever the light was. none of the lights made any noise. at this point the other light followed the light that us passed over us and they slowly traveled away from us and out of sight.  we continued the rest of the way back to our truck, and confirmed that that experience indeed happened.  when i got home, i looked at the pictures we took.  they look nothing like they did in person, though they are unusual.  they are very colorful lines of light, and though the pictures were taken closely together, they all are different.
content.summary: Bright, dime sized yellow light followed us for 3 miles. it then separated into 3 flying sets of lights. 1 was solid red and stationary and the other 2 were red/white blinking and circling us.

content.detailedDescription: I am 60 years old with very good distant eye sight.I first saw an object 35 years ago above hills near a village called horsepath near oxford england,i looked out of my bedroom window to see a dark object in a uniform grey sky,it appeared to have a rough outline[not sharp]i later saw a photo in a book very similar which said it was a fake?From that point i looked to the sky more and about two months later i saw two orange orbes of light in almost the same area as before,over a period of about 20 min they came together separated came together[as one]separated then slowly drifted off beyond the hills.I saw nothing until about five years later when i saw an object pass from right to left between trees[see black/white photo]then the object over west norwood[south london]england,this time i had a good camera with an 18x telephoto lense,also on camcorder but due to max close up my every movement ment that the object appeared to move around a great amount.I believe all these reports are a waste of timebecause if these objects come from another world they will do what they will,it is no use to say "why dont they land on the grass at the white house if they are real"what is the point of applying our logic and parameters[perhaps they have infinite patience-after seeing our uncivilized anticts why should they wish to]though i believe that if it appears we may take our insanity closer to them they will prevent this.I have an interest in aircraft[i have visited air shows for many yearsi i do not think that i can be fooled by conventional craft,satellites,planets,birds etc:i do not know if the governments of the world have anything to hide perhaps not,i do not believe these are secret aircraft[they dont stay secret for long.
content.summary: High in the sky, clear/light cloud , appeared still but slow movement not easy to detect hence 20 min. to reach horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to get food on my lunch break and as i was pulling into the parking lot of a arbys returant in irvine california i noticed a light coming from some clouds at first i thought it was just a plane but the light was to bright to be a plane so i continued to watch as the light came out of the clouds an realized it was a disc shape object with a bright solid white light around the edge of the whole disk with specks of light all over the surface of it, it came out of the clouds from the east and stopped right in front of the clouds and started to swing in the air like a pendulum it swung back and forth from north to south about 3 to five times and on the last up swing, it was towards the south, it flipped completely over and took off towards the south into some more clouds and i lost sight of it, this all happend within 2 to 5 minutes, after the event i was shocked i never thought i would see something like that in my life i called and texed some of my friends and my grandmother and told them wut i had just seen.
content.summary: Saw a disk shaped object fly out of some cloud cover swing back and forth and flip over and fly back into cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription:
Location: walmart parking lot @ i-20 and cooper
time: 11:20 a.M. (taken from my receipt)
date: 12/31/08

as i was walking out to my car with my groceries looking at the clear blue sky i noticed a large reddish brown roofless 2-story shaped "house" tilted to the right hovering in the sky. as i put my groceries in my car, returned the cart, started my car and pulled out i continued to observe the object. it was in a northwest direction over cooper st./room store about 3/4 of a mile away over i-20. i am unsure of how high up it was because the walmart is on a hill so 500 to 700 feet up is only a guestimate. the reason i say roofless is because there appeared to be "eaves" coming from the two top corners that extended out from the object at an angle about a quarter of the length of each side like the eaves of a roof except it was flat on top. it appeared to be a solid object, reddish brown with the center being lighter, and to have some texture to it. it looked old to me. when a car in the opposite direction was approaching a little fast in the parking lot i took my eyes away for about 2 to 4 seconds and when i looked back it was gone, however, in its place there was a dull silver cigar-shaped object that was reflecting the sun. as i turned onto bardin st. to make a u-turn back onto cooper st. i lost site of it. back on cooper st. going north over i-20 bridge, where the view down w i-20 is excellent, it had disappeared. i observed it from start to end about 1 minute and 30 seconds. my initial reaction was not really registering it as anything except an object in the sky as my mind was on getting my errands done but the more i observed it the more i realized i was looking at something that was anything but normal. my first thought was that maybe it was an old plane with the cloth-covered wings but quickly ruled that out because of color, size and shape and it did not appear to be moving. my next thought was maybe some bizarre blimp that was possibly having trouble. having seen many types of planes, blimps, helicopters, etc. because of my proximity to arlington airport and being in the flight path of dfw, plus searching the web for the last 33 days, i can now honestly say that i have found nothing that comes close to identifying it. so despite my initial trepidation at reporting this, i'm hoping that because of all the traffic and people out that day, maybe someone else saw this object and can tell me what it was. thank you.
content.summary: Large reddish brown roofless "2-story house" shape tilted to right hovering in sky nw direction over i-20.

content.detailedDescription:
I have kept a secret for about a decade or so. i am still very reluctant and incase you think i am crazy i am not going to use my real name, but just call me george. 

i was living in the metro area of portland or. i was driving to work on a rainy morning in late winter or early spring of 1996. my wife was also riding in the passenger seat, sleeping. it was about 7:30am, it was daylight out and i was headed west bound on i-84, very close to the i-5 jct. there is a point at the end of 84, where you can see the portland sky-line on the other side of the willamette river. i was at this point that i saw the most unbelievable thing. something was flying very, very low over the river. but the most incredible thing was (this is not a hallucination), i could see through the thing. it was like when you take a very clear but detailed glass, flip it upside down and then run water over it, because of how the water spills over the glass you can see the shape of the glass. only everything within that water covered shape is a bit blurry. this is what the rain did to the shape. i could see above the shape. i could see below the shape (till i got closer on 84). and i could see a bit blurred or distorted image through the shape. and the shape was not a disc or triangle. it had distinguishable layers or decks, parallel to the ground, and those decks were broken up into projected portions off set from each other. but the whole thing was like an elongated football, with the back end a little flat compared to the front.

the object was moving over the willamette from the south to the north. as i said i was moving down 84, and just past the lloyd center exit, 84 begins to dip down, and there is where i began to see it. at this point, 84 is in a small ravine. so as i can see the skyline, this object is coming into view from the left side of the ravine. i kept watching it and trying to get my wife awake. it moves in front of me and it is so big i can���t see it all in the opening of the ravine. i had to wait till the front part was past the right side of the ravine, to see its end. i know it was much bigger then any thing i had ever seen by then or since. 

i kept listening for several days to the news to see if any one else had seen it. i heard no mention of this thing. so there was no way i was going to say a thing. not until recently, now that i realize 100's of other people have seen flying objects over the years, that they couldn���t explain, did i feel maybe i could share this. i guess you guys would probably call this a ufo.
content.summary: Object flying very low over willamette river.

content.detailedDescription:
I know this isnt the normal (whats' normal) but, i went to stay at a haunted bed and breakfast and took several photo's with anomolies in them. i captured a really great pic of a mans face in the window of our cottage. we were really impressed with the photo. as i studied the pic i noticed something unusual. right below the face in the window itself is an entity of some sort. if you look closely you can clearly see something else in the photo with the mans face. i did some work on the picture and discovered that the entity is solid, 3d, and really there. the ghost face was very impressive but the other thing that is there is much more impressive.

the reason i am sending this to you is, upon studiyng the picture i wondered, "could i have captured an alien in the same picture, in the same window with a mans face. what are the odds, billion to one? all i know is, there is a creature there and looks like a grey. 

if somebody could please review my pics and give me opinion that would be great. i have attached the pics (one cropped, one full size) they are the original pic with no modifications at all (the cropped pic may have some).

again, i know this is not the norm but, my gosh, it's strange.

i had no idea until yesterday it was there. by the way, i also captured some ghost images on the same trip but, the creature in the window below the mans face is astonishing. the man appears to be staring out the window at the top right corner. right below, actually appearing to be solid, in front of the shutters but behind the glass. it is the window to the far right of the cottage.

let me know what you think,

sincerely,

michael monk
content.summary: Was doing a paranormal (amateur) investigation, took picture with being.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home,east bound on 161east towards new albany, coming from 270 e of columbus, when i was 1 mile from my exit- i looked up out of my window and saw an oval-like shaped object flying east as well.At first i thought it was just a plane,but as i watched it was very shiny & silver like in color,& there were no clouds around it.I was driving 60mph,and this thing looked to be keeping pace with me,untill it suddenly stopped.I quickly checked the time,then looked back it was still there for another 2 minutes aprox.I put on my brake to slow down and watch it stay stationary,but then i had to look away for a few seconds,then when i looked back-it was gone.
i don't know for sure what it was.I know it wasn't an airplane.I've seen several strange things like this lately.On the 3rd of feb. i and another guy in the kroger parking lot of new albany looked up at sunset at this bright cirle like object moving very fast across the sky.I just got in my car and left. but he kept on staring at it.I dunno what it was either.
content.summary: I saw an oval-like shaped object,very shiny & silver looking flying in daylight hours.I knew it was no plane when it stopped moving,then gone in 4 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: see general sighting form 1 attached
content.summary: Football shaped object<?Xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

content.detailedDescription:
I saw this ufo near the place i live(not to far from bod���, northern norway), i had a real good look at it through binoculars, but i saw only the lights, i was not able to make out the shape or construction, other than the lights in a triangular configuration, the middle light was almost as bright as the other, it stood still in the air, i recon the altitude was around 900 meters, it shed a light on the ground. the light was not intense, but more orange in color, like that of a candle or fireplace, but it lit up the ground in a circle of more than 500 meters, the light was not steady, it flickered a bit, but i was able to see trees and terrain details in the light.
at some point it disappears, so fast that it seemed like the lights just went out.

it made no sound that i could hear, but i was at some distance.

it looked very much like the ufo in this clip:

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=6o2idp0x2zi

i`m skeptical person, but i really don`t know what i saw, i`ve been interested in military and civilan aircrafts all my life, but i can`t say i recognise this one.
content.summary: Sighting of triangular shaped ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving down cc hwy in a northernly direction, noticed object, watched as we could while road twisted & turned, did not stop, about 3 minutes of siting, it just vanished.  i just watched the videos of chris bledsoe, and the ufo we watched was much like your animation, although only one of them.  (i reported this also at nuforc.Org-the next day http://www.Nuforc.Org/webreports/061/s61595.Html)
just wanted to share, as it was in the same time frame...Wish i had more to tell you.  thanks for your work!
content.summary: Orange-ish, slowly blinking-bright to dull, stationary.

content.detailedDescription: After the major rain fell from recent storms, i heard loud noises coming from my neighbor's yard. we live in a compact cookie cutter neighborhood so it was very close. i looked out of a second story window and saw bright pulsating lights above my neighbor's house with loud whooshing sounds just like you hear in the movies. i didn't know what to think and yelled at my husband. he looked out lower level window and we both immediately ran outside. it was so close it was scary. the noise was loud and we both thought the same thing. it was obvious. i thought something terrible was going to happen. i ran inside and looked out the window again, then grabbed my camera. i took a short video of the lights. by the time i got back outside they had moved about a block away. i hope someone else saw the same thing and also has photos/video. i also called the police and fire dept but they had no reports. this seemed like it was directly above our street on the nw side of indianapolis.
content.summary: Bright red, blue, orange lights over neighborhood.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home form a convention i had attended in orlando, fl and was driving alone and on a dark two lane highway (sr 520) at approx. 11 pm at night with no other traffic on the road and no street lights. it was an extremely clear and cold evening. i looked up at the sky and all of a sudden one of the "stars" that i was gazing at suddenly split in two and the two objects seemed to eject themselves in two separate directions(kind of like watching fireworks). and then i looked directly above me (thru the car windshield) and a small blue object in the sky (which i assumed was another "star" in the sky) went from being a small blue spec in the sky to a larger white object that got brighter and brighter, until i began to think it was an airplane. however, it didn't move from where i originally saw it. it just got bigger and bigger and seemed to be getting closer and closer, but then it started to get smaller and smaller until it looked exactly like what i had seen in the 1st place. and i wouldn't have thought anything of it, except that it happened again two more times with the same object. it did it one more time and then i gave up staring at it. also, because i was getting closer to i-95 south, where there were other cars on the road and street lights again. if i hadn't been alone in my car, i would have stopped on the side of the road to watch for more. there was definitely something going on up there! if you have questions, please contact me by email at suntreerealtor@msn.Com and please do not call me on the phone. at least not for an initial contact info. thanks! gail crowley in melbourne, fl p.S. if you had similar reports like mine recently, especially taking place in my area (east coast - central fl), then i'd really appreciate knowing about it. thanks again! p.P.S. no photos. sorry!!
content.summary: One object split into two and one "star" getting bright and fading 3 times.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on highway 36 into boulder, colorado and i noticed a bright white light hovering above the city.  it appeared to have multiple lights clustered together as a single unit (large light on top and two smaller lights on bottom).  i thought that it looked strange and it didn't have blinking lights and was larger than a helicopter would have been at my distance (approx a couple miles).  the object appeared hazy.  it hovered in the same spot for about 4 minutes,  and then slowly moved down towards the foothills.  i called my wife to tell her to look out of our back door to see if she could see it, but it was already out of her line of sight.  i couldn���t tell whether or not the light actually went behind or in front of the flatirons before it finally went out of sight as i drove through town.
content.summary: Bright light hovering over boulder and then slowly descending over foothills.

content.detailedDescription: I was by myself at the bus stop near garden grove waiting for my bus ride home. i was staring in the general direction and i believed that i was witnessing a shooting star. i was looking northwest towards bolsa chica and huntington beach. it was leaving a trail when it was coming down. suddenly, it swung back upwards after almost hitting the ground! it happened at 7:23 pm exactly and lasted for about a minute, then trajected it's way back up to the top of the sky from where it began. i felt like it was peeking at me through some trees and it made me feel a tad awkward because it kept swaying back and forth. i tried not to stare at it for too long because i felt uncomfortable when i realized it wasn't a shooting star. it was beautiful and magnificent, nonetheless, bright-neon green-and an awesome sight of light to see!! i just didn't want to stare at it for too long. god i wish i would have had a video camera to have taped it for everyone who did not see it! just 5 minutes later, a helicopter was flying in that same area. this did not affect my cellphone communications or my cellphone clock.
content.summary: It fell like a shooting star and then swung back up in a pendulum motion (or like a yo-yo). it was bright neon green and as big as my thumbnail.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm sitting here watching an episode of ufo hunters... object over o'hare. 

during one of the commercials, i didn't catch all of it, they showed a triangle of lights that looked identical to something that i recorded on sept. 8, 2007 off the nasa channel.  it was interesting.... please compare with similar sightings of other triangular lights.
 
endeavour ice crystals or ufo's?
i have it posted on youtube...The file size to send is 65meg  http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=spcfasrfkoq
once the narrators comments were through, live shots from the shuttle were discontinued.
 
thanks, any comments would be greatly appreciated.
jeff
content.summary: Endeavour ice crystals or ufo's?

content.detailedDescription:
I grew up at 228 w 6th st in irving texas. i was 7 years old during the summer of '57. our house was not air conditioned and i often slept with my head and pillow in the window to be cooler. a slightly older cousin was spending the night and we were both in bed with the lights off. i had a wonderful first grade teacher that got me interested in astronomy with her teaching, so i would often gaze up at the stars at night ...Sometimes for long periods of time ...Until i got sleepy. this night the saturn shaped object slowly came into my view as it came over my house and stopped. i started yelling at my cousin who was already asleep to come look but he was a too slow getting up to see it. the object elevated up and to the right slightly ...Then zipped away. my mom and dad had a garage apartment right outside of my room and an older cousin and her husband were staying there at that time. as i was calming down a bit they pulled into the driveway and i yelled and asked them if they had seen the flying saucer that was right above the house. her husband told me no ...But they had been hearing things on the radio about a ufo sighting in the area ...I remember thinking ...How neat-o ...And i had just seen it! i asked my dad a few years ago when did my cousin and her husband live in the apartment and he told me for a few months in late 1957.
 
fast forward 50 years and i am talking to my cousin whom i hadn't seen in a few years and he aks me if i still remembered the summer of the ufo ...Yep ...Like it was yesterday!
 
my description of it:  ...A hovering metalic object ..Saturn shaped ...A globe with a ring around it ...No sound.

i wanted to share this after all of these years ...Thnak you.
content.summary: A hovering, metalic, saturn shaped, object.

content.detailedDescription: Has been there every night for three days now military aircraft involed. was out side coming home from work. very extreme bright light. stayed motionless when i went back outside it moved further east. felt uneasy,would disappear.
content.summary: Brighter than a star in eastern sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving westbound on i-68 and saw a  dull orange light. there was very heavy cloud cover so i am sure it was not a star or a satellite. 
i also ad my scanner on in my truck set to the aircraft frequencies and there seemed to be no local traffic in the area.

i got off the nearest exit (#4) and the orange sphere dimmed on and off while it traveled from north east to the south east.

as a person with aeronautics experience, i can say with great certainty this was not an aircraft. 

i ave emailed my friend who works at morgantown airport (kmgw) to see if he had anything strange on radar tonight.
content.summary: Round orange disk traveling from north west to south east.

content.detailedDescription:
It was sunday night @ 8:30 pm i had just finished dinner and went out back for my after dinner cigarret and i had noticed the clouds were strange. by strange i mean they were really low and wispy. as i was looking up i noticed three bright lights just sitting there in the sky. they were not very high about the hight of the tree tops. i thought they were strange but would not really have given them much thought until they moved. it was at this time i had realized that the three lights were connected. the object began to rotate in a clockwise position while remaining in one place. the object itself was very large at least the size of my house. after it rotated one time it began to move silently. when it began to move i shouted for my partner who was still inside. it slowly moved over my house and that is where he saw the object. it was moving south south/west . he saw the lights and figured it was just some sort of aircraft from edwards airforce base. if this is some kind of expieramental aircraft then we are way more advanced then anyone knows. this object was large, it was black , and it moved with no sound. the following day i did recall a slight hum like an electrical sound but very slight. we watched the object fly away and as it was moving it did not move in any way that an airplane or hellicopter would. i live next to the burbank airport so i am used to airplanes and this was no airplane. i have been on the net for weeks hoping someone else had seen what i saw. i have yet to see anything. this event has disturbed me because i have always been a skeptick. i have no answers to what i have seen. 
.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw a giant black triangle aircraft hovering over my back yard.

content.detailedDescription: First, i am not the best typist in the world. i was at my computer at home and out of my periphials i saw this green fireball about 1000 to 2000 feet in altitude shoot towards the south west. after that i called a friend that lived down the road who i assumed lived right under where the fire ball would have been. i was like i think i just saw a ufo. and he asked if i saw the big green light too.He had seen it from about a mile away from where i was. he was not at his home and had a clear view of what i saw.  so after talking to him about it i let it go.  about 3 days later i had been talking to friends and these 3 guys came up to me who i had been friends with asked if i saw the green fireball too. and i said yes of course, they then proceeded to tell me that they saw it too from 2 miles the other direction i am from my other friend. now i do not know what this is, but i have been interested in the paranormal and ufos my whole life and was just wondering if anyone else had seen this that night. and i know it sounds stupid like a green fireball. but i gave my friend no hint of what i saw and he started talking about it before i did about what he saw. so if anyone saw it please speak up because i am really curious.
content.summary: Green sparkling fireball heading south west.

content.detailedDescription:
Never never never never give anything to the gov. or army  regarding ufo -that s the worst thing to do you will never get it back and they gone a denied it. better to find organization like here or news media instead to
someone who will try to hide.They will always tell you a nice story that they gone a do better job for picture or analise with a superior equipment
but it s just to get it from you and after you will never hear again about it they even gave you false name.
be careful.
content.summary: Never never never never give anything to the gov. or army regarding ufo - worst thing to do you will never get  it back.

content.detailedDescription:
I was doing some search on ufo videos on youtube and found something interesting. one footage was from actual fox news covering columbia shuttle disaster, feb 2003 and the other one is from someone in hong kong in 1995.

if you notice the ufos in both the footages they look almost identical. the footage from fox news was taken from a professional news camera and the ufo is very very vivid in this footage. the footage from hong kong i assume was shot from a consumer vhs camera available at that time. if you notice the ufo shape, they look very similar, or in my opinion exactly the same.

here are the videos i am talking about:

hong kong 1995:
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=g2e6ft1_y6y

fox news 2003:
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=nhc5oihfufo

the hong kong footage shows the object glowing while preserving its shape. fox news footage is very crisp and clear. watch them yourself and be the judge
content.summary: Identical ufos from different parts of the world and year

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed a bright star/orb in the same place from about 6pm -10;30 pm pst  took a couple of pics the following day around 1pm 1.07.09 look up and noticed an orb/star/sphere like object stationary for about 2hrs enough time to go home and grab my camera and take a picture.  as i was taking the pics i realized it was the same position as the previous night. 
h
